ValidationRule.description: Solutions are always required for new business opportunities. The relevant Byndie should be added as a Solution Owner.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), Platform__c="Bynder", NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(CreatedDate>Now()-0.0007),
NOT( OR ( ISCHANGED(Demo_Completed_Outbound__c), ISCHANGED(Solution_Required_in_Flow__c), Solution_Required_in_Flow__c = True, CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Finance"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"), $Profile.Name = "Automated Process", CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"[Bynder] Legal"))),
OR(ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business-Enterprise Cloud"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business - Expansion Portal"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business - Platform Transfer")),
ISBLANK(Solution_Owner__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Solutions_Required__c,"No")),
OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Qualified"))), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A solution owner is mandatory for new business opportunities - please fill out this field.
